title: Smart Data Models mapping of RPaM ontology data model Legislation
description: A class to describe a reference to a piece of legislation.

id.description: Property. Unique Id of the entity

type.description: Property. It has to be Legislation

ID.description: Property. An identifier to refer to the legislation.

Title.description: Property. The title of the legislation.

Description.description: Property. The textual description of the legislation.

JurisdictionLevel.description: Relationship. The jurisdiction level for the legislation.

Article.description: Property. The article of the legislation.

URI.description: Property. A URI to the legislation.

Language.description: Property. The language of the legislation.

JurisdictionRegionAddress.description: Property. The geopolitical region in which this legislation applies.
